## Species {#spatlas}

```{r} 
atlas <- dir(here::here("figures","biotic","atlas"), full.names = TRUE)
nm <- basename(atlas)
out <- here::here("data","data-biotic")
sp <- read.csv(here::here(out, "marine_species","species_list.csv"))
mm <- read.csv(here::here(out, "marine_mammals","mm_list.csv"))
sb <- read.csv(here::here(out, "sea_birds","bird_list.csv"))
```

### Marine species 

```{r out.width = "90%", echo=FALSE, fig.align='center'}
uid <- nm %in% glue::glue("{sp$shortname}.png")
knitr::include_graphics(atlas[uid])
``` 

### Marine mammals

```{r out.width = "90%", echo=FALSE, fig.align='center'}
uid <- nm %in% glue::glue("{tools::file_path_sans_ext(mm$filename)}.png")
knitr::include_graphics(atlas[uid])
``` 

### Sea birds 

```{r out.width = "90%", echo=FALSE, fig.align='center'}
uid <- nm %in% glue::glue("{sb$shortname}.png")
knitr::include_graphics(atlas[uid])
```
